MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Hackett River Project in North America dated November 2005

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Hackett River Project in North America dated November 2005
document.description: The report contains information about the Hackett River Property in Nunavut, its geological features, the resource estimates of various deposits, and the results of the 2005 drill program by Sabina.
